name: Amok Runner
description:
Meet Stefan Zweig, one of the most famous authors of his time. Through Amok Runner, experience his fascinating and rich world which is full of surprises.

DLSS and FIDELITY FX SUPPORT

Amok Runner supports NVIDIA® DLSS and AMD FidelityFX™ technologies that enable gorgeous, high-quality sharp images without sacrificing frame rates.

CONTROLS

A wide variety of game controllers are supported, as well as fully customizable keyboard keys and adjustable mouse sensitivity.

VISUALS

With widescreen, HDR and 4K resolution support, you can get high-quality visuals and change all the settings individually.
